Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Subseries IV.C Office of Victoria Wagner - editorial and publicity departments
Subseries IV.C Office of Victoria Wagner - editorial and publicity departments

Files of the editorial and publicity departments, largely created by Lacretia Manchester, editorial and publicity assistant to the director. Types of materials mostly include information records (brief reports describing school activities), correspondence, reports, memos, press releases, and news clippings. In this era, press releases were created frequently and cover a range of topics. Some general 3-School information and administrative business can be found throughout. Original folder titles have been retained.
